backend/main.mo: Defines an order actor with create, retrieve, update UPI reference, and list operations using a Map store.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme definitions for light/dark modes with base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, checkout, order confirmation, and payment submitted pages wrapped in a forced-dark ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying product info, support details, social links, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout with luxury dark background texture, top navigation, page outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with branding and a Buy Now button that routes to checkout.
frontend/src/components/orders/UPIRefere: Form for submitting a UPI transaction reference with validation and navigation on success.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Features section showing five product features with icons and reveal-on-scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section displaying product name, price, a buy button, and an animated image with reveal and tilt effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/OfferSe: Offer section highlighting a discounted price with scroll reveal and a checkout button.
frontend/src/components/sections/TrustSe: Trust section showing reassurance badges like replacement and free shipping with scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/upi/UPIPaymentPa: UPI payment panel that generates a QR code and link for payment along with amount details.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: Defines static UPI configuration including VPA, payee name, and transaction note.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for creating orders, fetching orders, and submitting UPI references using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook that reveals an element when it becomes visible via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useTilt.ts: Hook that applies a mouse-based tilt effect to an element unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining the theme, colors, and layout behavior.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Exports product name, price, and a helper to calculate total cost by quantity.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Builds a UPI payment URL using configured VPA, payee details, and order info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout form with validation, quantity selection, total calculation, and order creation before navigating to the confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main marketing landing page composed of hero, features, offer, and trust sections.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order details and conditionally shows UPI payment panel or payment reference after fetching order data.
Shows payment submission confirmation with order ID, reference, and post-payment guidance.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project’s dark luxury UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the single‑product ecommerce site.
